Package it.polimi.ingsw.Listeners

Class ModelViewListener

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Listeners.Listener
it.polimi.ingsw.Listeners.ModelViewListener
public class ModelViewListener extends Listener
Listener from model to view, i.e., server to client.

  • Field Details

    • lastRequest

      private GenericRequest lastRequest
      Attribute containing the last request sent.

    • requestEventIndex

      private int requestEventIndex
      Attribute representing the number of requests sent without the corresponding response. In order for the listener to send a new request, this must be zero.

    • client

      private final Client client
      The client associated with the listener.

    • nickname

      public String nickname
      The nickname of the user associated with the listener.

    • chatMessages

      private final Queue<ChatMessage> chatMessages
      The list of chat messages.

    • server

      private final ServerImpl server
      The server bound to this specific listener. The listener will pass the information to the server which will likewise, pass it to the client

  • Constructor Details

    • ModelViewListener

      public ModelViewListener(ServerImpl server, Client client) throws RemoteException
      Constructor Class that represents the listener situated between the Model and the View. This listener will receive updates from the model and will pass them to the specific view, which will be updated aswell.
      Parameters:
      server - the server that will receive the updates from this listener
      client - the client that sends the updates to this listener
      Throws:
      RemoteException - default rmi exception

  • Method Details

    • handleEvent

      public void handleEvent() throws RemoteException
      method override from abstract super class Listener It will pass it to the server and then if the event was indeed received correctly, it will finally remove it from the queue.
      Specified by:
      handleEvent in class Listener
      Throws:
      RemoteException - remote exception for RMI connection

    • addChatMessage

      public void addChatMessage(ChatMessage message)
      Method to add a chat message to the specific list.
      Parameters:
      message - the received chat message

    • stop

      public void stop()
      Method to stop the running threads.

    • addEvent

      public void addEvent(GenericEvent event)
      Method to handle the event to be sent to the corresponding client.
      Overrides:
      addEvent in class Listener
      Parameters:
      event - event to be handled.
